QuestData.Title: No Mercy for the Merciless
QuestData.Description: Welcome to Wintergrasp, $n. Your mission is simple. Defeat ten of the Horde's finest. Now, go! Bring victory to the Alliance!
QuestData.LogDescription: Commander Zanneth in Wintergrasp Fortress wants you to slay 10 members of the Horde. Quest can only be auto completed while within the Battle for Wintergrasp.
